Articles.Content:
the Procedural Fairings mod

Is brilliant.

I would like a similar thing in stock ksp.

or something like kw rocketry fairings.

Edited November 6, 2014 by kerbingamer376
Personally I'd prefer fairing similar to KW Rocketry. No offence but the Procedural Fairings are, for the lack of a better word, ugly.

I actually much prefer the KW standard fairings. As with most components the modular kit-of-parts nature of it I think forces you to think more creatively about how to fit payloads. Also I think the procedural fairings kind of look like garbage by comparison.

Double shoot down! *Hi five*

Haha jk kerbingamer, Im totally with you on the game needing fairings in general though.
Looks like Pthigrivi and I totally agree. The game really needs better aerodynamics AND a set of working fairings.

Looks like Pthigrivi and I totally agree. The game really needs better aerodynamics AND a set of working fairings.

Well at least we know we're gonna be getting better aerodynamics I'd like to see some fairings added but I know the devs don't usually add parts when they're so readily available through mods. I also prefer KW to PF. The PF's are too unrealistic in some situations.
